title: Homepage Picture
body:
To replace the image, you can replace /core/assets/img/background-1920x828.jpg with an image of your choice, just make sure you overwrite the existing image. If it doesn't change after replacing the file, try pressing Ctrl+F5 in your browser while viewing the homepage to clear the cache.

If you wish to change the text, you can search for it in ``/styles/language/<language>/language.php``

To remove the text, you can remove it from near the top of ``/styles/templates/<template>/index.tpl``
